title: Bug 124570: Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session
description: Bug 124570: Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session
OB: When using BIRT 2.0 RC2, the Preview button on the toolbar always displays the first report opened in the session, regardless of the currently selected report.
EB: The Preview button on the toolbar should display the currently selected report when clicked, instead of always showing the first report opened in the session.
SR:
To reproduce the problem:
1. Start BIRT 2.0 RC2 and create a project.
2. Import the attached two designs into the project.
3. Open Product Catalog.
4. Click on the Preview button on the toolbar to see the report.
5. Close the viewer.
6. Click on another report in the project.
7. Click on the Preview button on the toolbar again to see the report. The report displayed should be the currently selected report, not the first report opened.
